channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for CO
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for CO

item.title: Report X-2024120603
item.description:
Report X-2024120603

Identified by scraper @ 2024-12-13T15:15:09+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-12-10
  • City: COLORADO SPRINGS
  • State: CO
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: FEDERAL EXPRESS CORPORATION
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: PACKAGE DISCOVERED DURING SORT. INSPECTION FOUND NON-DECLARED PAINT CAN WITHIN BOX. NO ORIENTATION ARROWS OR LQ INDICATED. PULLED SDS AND FOUND PACKAGE IS CONSIDERED HAZARDOUS. 12/11/24 0657 ADDED PICTURES AND PDFS OF SDS AND ISF REPORTS.

item.title: Report E-2024120224
item.description:
Report E-2024120224

Identified by scraper @ 2024-12-13T15:15:09+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-11-22
  • City: DENVER
  • State: CO
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: VEOLIA ES TECHNICAL SOLUTIONS, L.L.C.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 75000
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: At ~1900 hours, a Veolia driver picked up a tanker of DMF and piperidine to move it to a 3rd party transporter yard. The manway cover was not secure allowing liquid to spill from the tanker onto the soil. The Veolia emergency response number was called and EnviroServe was dispatched. EnviroServe estimated the spill affected 2000' X 10' of dirt. The affected soil was collected into roll off dumpsters for disposal. The NRC and CDPHE Emergency Reporting were contacted and Veolia received a call from the City and County of Denver Environmental Quality Duty Officer.
